The blast from the tail made Remus fell on his back. While falling he
gave =
a burst from his trhuster trying to get away from scorponok and
doing some =
damage. But the rockets promptly put a end to this try.
Remus fell on his b=
ack badly damage to his chest and his left arm. He
knew his trhuster could =
give him a last burst. His next move could be
dececive. Razorwing was comin=
g. He had to gain some time, just a
little more.

Remus : This is not over =
yet Scorponok! I'll be back to get you, that
is if you get away from this m=
ess.

Remus couldn't Jotunn in if field of vision. Where were he?
